items.sentence: I\'m supposed to help Tom with his homework.
Mary said she thought she could impress Tom.
Tom wished Mary wouldn\'t be so mean to him.
This is a fun activity for the whole family.
Why didn\'t you do that the way I suggested?
Many of the guests overstayed their welcome.
Mary asked Tom to pretend to be her husband.
Dr. Jackson is the doctor that treated Mary.
Tom told Mary everything she needed to know.
I know Tom doesn\'t really enjoy doing that.
I can\'t wait to tell you about what we did.
What Tom has suggested probably won\'t work.
Would you like to eat dinner on the veranda?
What have you accomplished so far this week?
What kind of a place will we be able to get?
Tom doesn\'t care about anybody but himself.
Did you really think I\'d leave without you?
Did you tell Tom that he shouldn\'t help us?
We were just having a friendly conversation.
Tom went to the bus station to pick Mary up.
